COMMENTS: The statistic assigned to BUILDINGS_COLLAPSED is expressed as "Houses destroyed" in the main reference.
Geo locations: Kumamoto, Miyazaki, Saga (Adm1); FATALITIES and INJURIES aggregated from both foreshock (4/14) and mainshock (4/16)

This should be taken as the most reliable source as it is an official report from the Japanese government one year following the event; DISPLACED_POPULATION refers to peak evacuees in shelters; building damage refers to housing damage where BUILDINGS_DAMAGED is the sum of those partially destroyed and partially damaged. Non-residential damage data also exists in the report (439 public buildings, and 11,0007 other non-residential buildings)
